alert.note: Alert for Posey (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 15 at 9:26PM EDT until March 19 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Illinois... Wabash River at New Harmony. .A minor rise is still expected along the Wabash River at New Harmony into the middle of this week. The river level is forecast to crest in the minor flooding range, then fall below flood stage later this week. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at New Harmony. * WHEN...Until Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Harmonie State Park is closed. Surrounding bottomland is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 17.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain nearly steady around 17.5 feet through Thursday morning before falling. The river is expected to fall below flood stage on Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
